issue.title: [C++][Compute] Formalize "metafunction" concept
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8917](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8917). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A metafunction is a function that provides the `Execute` API but does not contain any kernels. Such functions can also handle non-Array/Scalar inputs like RecordBatch or Table. 

This will enable bindings to invoke such functions (like take, filter) like

```Java

call_function('take', [table, indices])
```
